content.body: We could do Records and Tuples better by not introducing any new characters at all: `{ ... ]` for records and `[ ... }` for tuples. If you disagree with this, we'll go with swapped syntax instead.
content.formatted_body: We could do Records and Tuples better by not introducing any new characters at all: { ... ] for records and [ ... } for tuples. If you disagree with this, we'll go with swapped syntax instead.

content.body: that'd make likely mismatching bugs suddenly become valid syntax with wildly different semantics
Reminds me of the [a, b) and (a, b] notations for intervals. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interval_(mathematics)#Notations_for_intervals
Incidentally, those are two of my least favorite math syntaxes, haha.
Sorry, Pokute, I don’t think it’s a good idea, but it was worth a shot. : )
